member.name: T:Sudoku.Concepts.DeadlyPattern
member.summary: Represents a type that checks and infers for a pattern (specified as a , but invalid - multiple solutions), determining whether the pattern is a deadly pattern.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Concepts.DeadlyPattern.IsDeadlyPattern(Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@)
member.summary: Determines whether a pattern is a deadly pattern.
member.exception: Throws when the argument is valid.
